fields.name: ErrorMessage
fields.fieldText:
ERROR: You have an error. Please read the message below to determine what that is and click Previous to try again or Finish to do nothing.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

screens.name: Update_Caller_and_Injured_Party_Info
screens.label: Update Caller and Injured Party Info

fields.name: Are_you_calling_in_on_behalf_of_you_or_a_loved_one
fields.fieldText: Are you calling in on behalf of you or a loved one

validationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a Home Phone or Mobile Phone

fields.name: Authority_to_sign_on_behalf_of_Injured_Party
fields.fieldText: Do you have the authority to sign on behalf of the Injured Party?

fields.name: Relation_to_the_individual
fields.fieldText: What is your relation to this individual?

validationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a Home Phone or Mobile Phone

value.stringValue: What is a good email to reach you at?

fields.name: Is_your_loved_one_still_living
fields.fieldText: Is your loved one still living?

fields.name: Date_of_death_of_the_injured_party
fields.fieldText: What is the date of their death (passing)?

fields.name: Are_you_the_executor_of_the_will
fields.fieldText: Are you the executor of the will?

fields.fieldText: In which state did the death occur?

fields.name: Are_you_the_Executor_of_Estate_EOE
fields.fieldText: Are you the Executor of Estate (EOE)?

textTemplates.name: CallerChangeNote
textTemplates.text:
Caller Information Updated:


Client/Caller Name:

Before: {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__First_Name__c} {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.Middle_Name__c} {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Last_Name__c} {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.Suffix__c}

After: {!Client_Caller_First_Name} {!Client_Caller_Middle_Name} {!Client_Caller_Last_Name} {!SuffixClient}


Client/Caller Home Phone:

Before: {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Phone_Home__c}

After: {!HomePhone.value}


Client/Caller Mobile Phone:

Before: {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Phone_Mobile__c}

After: {!MobilePhone.value}


Client/Caller Date of Birth:

Before: {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Date_of_birth__c}

After: {!Date_of_Birth}


Client/Caller Gender:

Before: {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Gender__c}

After: {!Gender}


Client/Caller Marital Status:

Before: {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.Marital_Status__c}

After: {!Marital_Status}


Client Caller Billing Address

Before: {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.BillingStreet} {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.BillingCity} {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.BillingStateCode}, {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.BillingPostalCode} {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.BillingCountryCode}

After: {!BillingAddress.street} {!BillingAddress.city} {!BillingAddress.provinceCode}, {!BillingAddress.postalCode} {!BillingAddress.countryCode}


Relation to the Individual: {!Relation_to_the_individual}


Authority to sign on behalf of Injured Party: {!Authority_to_sign_on_behalf_of_Injured_Party}


Is your loved one still living? {!Is_your_loved_one_still_living}


--------------------------------------------------


Injured Party Information Updated:


Injured Party First Name:

Before: {!Get_Intake.Injured_Party_First_Name__c} {!Get_Intake.Injured_Party_Middle_Name__c} {!Get_Intake.Injured_Party_Last_Name__c} {!Get_Intake.Injured_Party_Suffix__c}

After: {!Injured_Party_First_Name} {!Injured_Party_Middle_Name} {!Injured_Party_Last_Name} {!SuffixInjured}


Date of Death: {!Date_of_death_of_the_injured_party}
